quest.name: Hells Have No Fury
journal: 789th Order Dustman Bo Zu has a friend in need of a helping hand─preferably not Bo Zu's.

Bo Zu considers the 789th Order's acolyte, the eccentric Ba Go, one of his closest friends at the dig─a feeling which does not appear to be in any way mutual. With Ba Go in trouble and seeking the assistance of anyone not named Bo Zu, go and offer what help you may.

From what sense you can make of Ba Go's ramblings, a few of his so-called beauties─unhappy with their creator's treatment of them─have flown the coop and now wreak havoc in the vicinity of Iron Lake. At Ba Go's behest, seek them out and /soothe their anger, that they might return home and trouble innocent bystanders no more.
Their volatile hearts calmed, the pygmy bombs have returned to the loving care of their creator. Return to Ba Go in triumph.

Eager to make amends, Ba Go is far too preoccupied doting on his beauties to express any sort of gratitude for your part in securing their safe return. Return to Bo Zu and inform him that the deed is done.

Bo Zu is deeply appreciative of your efforts on behalf of his friend Ba Go, who he still considers a friend despite the latter's utter disregard for the hapless dustman. Having demonstrated both generosity and competence, you can expect Bo Zu to call upon you again next time he or one of his peers is in need...
objectives: Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
Report to 789th Order Dustman Bo Zu.

dialogue.name: BOZU
dialogue.text: Adventurer, how glad, glad I am to see you come. Ba Go is having a situation─a plight, a predicament, a situation─and what is trouble for Ba Go is trouble for us all. Bo Zu does not know much, but this Bo Zu knows. Yes, yes, I know.

dialogue.name: BOZU
dialogue.text: Bo Zu would like nothing more than to help his friend Ba Go─nothing, nothing at all. But Bo Zu's help is unwelcome─unsought, undesired, unwelcome. This makes Bo Zu sad, but what can Bo Zu do? Only send you─yes, yes, Bo Zu will send you.

dialogue.name: BOZU
dialogue.text: Bo Zu would like nothing more than to help his friend Ba Go─nothing, nothing at all. But Bo Zu's help is unwelcome─unsought, undesired, unwelcome. This makes Bo Zu sad, but what can Bo Zu do? Only send you─yes, yes, Bo Zu will send you!

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: Bo Zu sent you to me, he did? You will not eat my beauties' fingers and make my workshop go boom-boom like that one did? No, no, you will not?

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: Then maybe you can be of assistance─help, aid, assistance. With some of my beauties did I have a disagreement─a spat, a fight, a disagreement. Fled my workshop, they did, fled to Iron Lake where they seethe and sizzle and speak ill of Ba Go.

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: You will tell them Ba Go is sorry for what he said, yes? They are not getting fat─no, no─they are as slender, slim, and beautiful as ever. They will come back to Ba Go, yes? Ba Go implores of them─begs, beseeches, implores.

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: You will go to Iron Lake and bring runaway beauties back to Ba Go, yes? Tell them Ba Go is sorry for everything he said? Ba Go is nothing without his beauties...<sniff>...no, no, nothing.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The pygmy bomb is fuming with rage. Soothe it and convince it to return home to its master.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The pygmy bomb is not amused. Soothe it and convince it to return home to its master.

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: My beauties...my beauties return! Oh, glorious day! Ba Go was lost without you─wayward, astray, lost. Yes, yes, he was!

dialogue.name: BAGO
dialogue.text: Ba Go was a fool─a dolt, a dimwit, a fool! Foolish Ba Go will do anything you desire! Yes, yes, just promise you will never leave Ba Go's side ag─hm? Can't you see we are having a personal moment here, adventurer? Yes, yes, go back and bother Bo Zu.

dialogue.name: BOZU
dialogue.text: <sigh> That is Ba Go for you─no eye for anything but booms and beauties. He may not call Bo Zu friend, but does this change Bo Zu's feelings? No, no, never.

dialogue.name: BOZU
dialogue.text: I cannot speak for Ba Go─no, no, I cannot─but Bo Zu will not forget your kindness. Yes, Bo Zu will always remember who to ask when he needs something done. Yes, yes, I will!
